thread.title: Social scene: Kalonzo Musyoka seeks NASA ticket for top seat
thread.title_full: Social scene: Kalonzo Musyoka seeks NASA ticket for top seat

title: Social scene: Kalonzo Musyoka seeks NASA ticket for top seat
text:
Your are here » Home » Politics Kalonzo Musyoka seeks NASA ticket for top seat By Eric Abuga | Updated Mon, February 6th 2017 at 00:00 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter Wiper leader Kalonzo Musyoka addresses his supporters in Kenyenya market Kisii County. (Photo: Sammy Omingo/Standard) 
Wiper leader Kalonzo Musyoka has reignited the National Super Alliance (NASA) presidential debate, saying he was the best suited to be the Opposition flag bearer. 
Kalonzo made his first trip to Kisii after their maiden NASA rally in Bomet on Saturday. Speaking at various shopping centres in Kisii County, Kalonzo said he had talked to other Nasa leaders to allow him become the alliance’s flag bearer. 
“NASA has the answers to your prayers,” said Kalonzo. Kalonzo was speaking during a tour to drum up support for the party’s Kisii gubernatorial aspirant Lumumba Nyaberi. The Wiper leader is expected to continue with his Kisii tour. WATCH THIS
